adapter_name.title: X2Text Adapter ID
adapter_name.description: Provide a unique name for this adapter instance. Example: LLM Whisperer 1

url.title: URL
url.description: Provide the URL of the LLM Whisperer server.

processing_mode.title: Processing Mode
processing_mode.description: Text mode tries to extract text from PDF and falls to OCR if the PDF is a scanned image PDF. This should be your default selection. Use OCR mode if you want to force OCR to extract text. This could be useful if you are dealing with malformed PDFs.

output_mode.title: Output Mode
output_mode.description: Line printer mode tries to maintain the layout of the original document. This should be your default option. If the document contains tables and other complex layouts this option works very well with large LLMs. Text dump mode extracts all the text without considering layout.

processing_mode.title: Processing Mode
processing_mode.description: OCR mode forces OCR to extract text. This could be useful if you are dealing with malformed PDFs.

median_filter_size.title: Median Filter Size
median_filter_size.description: The median filter is used to remove noise from the image. The default value is 3.

gaussian_blur_radius.title: Gaussian Blur Radius
gaussian_blur_radius.description: The Gaussian blur is used for smoothing images and reducing noise. The default value is 1.0.
